Myrmidon stared at the door for a long moment, his optics dark and
narrow as he listened to the words this intruder said to him. Then with
a nod he touched a button on the side of the door and allowed it to
slide open. 

Looking inside the room Myrmidon recrossed his arms over his chest as
he did so. 

"I am not complacent!" Myrmidon's powerful voice even as its changed
slightly by the hum of the force shield that is still very much in
place, still filled the room. Even as he spoke though Murmidon felt a
certain 'rightness' to the words. From what he has seen thus far, no
one seemed to have that agressive spark. 

His optics looked over at the crates, at Malice's crouched form, "What
do you and this other Megatron bring that is so different then what is
already here?" Myrmidon grunted, "Battle? War? There is all we can find
several stories above our heads." Myrmidon said, speaking about the
battle going on outside. "Do you bring honor and power, or just chaos?"

Preston
(Myrmidon)

--- Robert Riley <chiyohakuryuu@...> wrote:

> Malice:
> 
> Malice cackled from the other side.  
> 
> "Change, you fool.  Change.  You all have become complacent and that
> endangers the future.  So we're going to take things into our own
> hands to save us all!"
> 
> 
> ----- Original Message ----
> From: Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...>
> To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
> Sent: Thursday, April 10, 2008 3:49:43 PM
> Subject: Re: Black Fortress
> 
> OOC: Sorry for taking so long to write, but for some reason your
> message didn't get to me until today. 
> 
> BIC:
> 
> Myrmidon stood looking at the door for a long moment, part of him
> wanting to open the door and jump into the battle that no doubt
> waited
> for him on the other side of the door, and yet something else
> screamed
> caution at him. Why would someone rush headlong into an enemy base,
> knowing that they would quickly bring to bear all the security
> measures
> that had on the intruder.
> 
> Pressing button on the control panel beside the room door he checked
> the condition of the room. The result was of course a single
> occupant,
> and that the room was totally shielded and powered down. So the room
> that could be an arena for battle was now doubling for a temporary
> cell. 
> 
> "Perceptor" Myrmidon called over the short range intrabase
> communications, "Report to my location, I believe I have our intruder
> pinned."
> 
> As Myrmidon waited went back to staring at the door as he crossed his
> arms over his massive chest, his optics narrowing. "DECEPTICON! !" He
> called through the door to malice, "You were a fool to enter this
> base.
> What are you looking for?"
> 
> Preston
> (Myrmidon)
> 
> --- Robert Riley <chiyohakuryuu@ yahoo.com> wrote:
> 
> > Malice:
> > 
> > Hearing and detecting the security measures being implaced to keep
> > him in the room, he could safely change forms. Now in classic form,
> > he lie in wait behind a stack of crates. He drew his swords and
> > smirked. Now he just had to find Rodimus. Nothing works better than
> > a ghost from the past.
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > ----- Original Message ----
> > From: Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@ yahoo.com>
> > To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups. com
> > Sent: Thursday, April 3, 2008 5:54:33 PM
> > Subject: Re: Black Fortress
> > 
> > With widening optics Myrmidon watched as the would be opponant flew
> > inside the base, some how shooting past the other defenders. 
> > 
> > "Fool!" Myrmidon growled. Weather he was talking about the intruder
> > or
> > the defenders at the door it is difficult to tell. 
> > 
> > With a thought Myrmidon shifted form assuming his avian mode and
> > followed. While he was smaller, about the size of a large eagle, he
> > was
> > outfitted with boosters amd missile launchers. He fired the former
> as
> > he pursued Malice into the base as he primed the latter, ready for
> > what
> > would come next. 
> > 
> > As Malice wound his way deeper into the base, Mymidon followed, his
> > sensors taking in the residual heat signature and exaust output.
> Even
> > for one without sensors Malice wasn't difficult to follow - the
> > sounds
> > of internal defences attempting to capture or kill him was a finger
> > pointing directly at him. 
> > 
> > Arriving at the door just after Malice entered his hidey hole of a
> > room, Myrmidon smiled. "Good, you have trapped yourself. There are
> no
> > other doors here." He nodded as he heard the bulkheads dropping
> down
> > in
> > different part of the base. 
> > 
> > "Computer!" Myrmidon crossed his arms over his chest. "Erect a
> > maximum
> > strength forceshield around ante cabin 447 and deactivate power."
> > 
> > ((OOC: Airly, you will have to let me know if that works.))
> > 
> > Preston
> > (Myrmidon)
> >

> of

> > > grenades in the path of the mortars and transaformed in a flash. 
> > > Being a smaller craft, he fired his engines and tilted his axis
> and
> > 
> > > flew sideways between the defenders and blasted open the door.
> > > > 
> > > > "Later, suckers! have fun with those Maximals, or whatever
> > they're
> > > 
> > > callin themselves these days," he called after them as he flew
> into
> > 
> > > the base and started looking for a hiding spot.
> > > > 
> > > > He wound down into the deeper parts of the base and ducked into
> > an 
> > > out of the way storage room, and hoped five minutes would pass 
> > > uninterrupted as he changed form and tried hacking into the door 
> > > controls to lock it out.
> > > >
